embeds.title: o7 Help
embeds.description: *This documentation assumes commands use the prefix `!` each server may have configured a different prefix for commands.*

fields.name: Blueprints
fields.value:
Get information about what it will take to manufacture items.

**!bp** _<name> (<#/#/#>: optional skill levels basic / advanced / expert)_

fields.name: Market Prices
fields.value:
Retrieves market data based on provided search terms.

**!pricecheck** _<item name>_
_aliases_: **!market** / **!mp** / **!pc** / **!price**/ **!value**

fields.name: Applications
fields.value:
Will ask the user questions that have been configured by the server admins and post the users answers in a specified channel.

**!apply** 
_aliases:_ **!app**  / **!application**

embeds.title: Administrative Commands
embeds.description: These commands require administrator permissions on your server to execute.

fields.name: Prefix
fields.value:
Set a custom prefix that this bot will respond to on your server.

**!prefix** <prefix>
_prefix_ can be a single character, emoji, or even a secret word!

fields.name: Application Configuration
fields.value:
Used to set the questions the bot will ask a user who uses the `apply` command as well as the channel completed applications will be posted to.

**!appconfig**

fields.name: Set Role
fields.value:
A helper to allow a server admin to quickly set a users role.

**!setrole** _<@user>_ _<@role>_
**!setrole**  _<@role>_ _<@user>_

embeds.title: Support the developer
embeds.description:
You can support me on Patreon!

Your support will help to keep o7 regularly updated and allow me to spend the time to add new features.

Supporters will receive a unique role on the o7 Dev discord and you can even gain access to the development build of o7 to test out features before they are released!

https://www.patreon.com/o7bot

fields.name: If you want to support, but don't have the $
fields.value:
You can send me ISK in Eve Echoes! Time I don't spend farming means more time I can spend adding features to this bot.

Send ISK via contract to `Evelyn Bray` in Eve Echoes. Be sure to tell me your Discord ID on the contract if you'd like the supporter role on the o7 Dev Discord server.

fields.name: o7 Dev Discord
fields.value:
Thank you for taking the time to use my bot. I am always open to suggestions for this bot on my development server.
<https://discord.gg/PfruVg4>

fields.name: Invite o7 to your own Discord server
fields.value: If you would like to invite this bot to your own discord, you may use this link <https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=753820564665270333&scope=bot&permissions=268954688>

fields.name: Market Data
fields.value: Special Thanks to <https://www.reddit.com/user/eve-echoes-market/> for creating <https://eve-echoes-market.com> where this bot queries for market data.
